E = interact

work

commands_raw:
*It is a letter.*
?> Read it{
DON'T REACH 100% NUMB.
Play games, look through the window, do something else than work to 
improve your mental state. :)
Have this game, reach the 4th level to get a surprise ;)
---
*Right beside the note there is a videogame called: Aberrant.*
---
*You take it*
signal(game,show)
}
name: tablet

commands_raw:
Watching the pink colored sky makes you feel better. 
---
Like there is something out there waiting for you to discover it.
---
Like the worlds is bigger than your room.
---
But it isn't.
name: Window1

commands_raw:
You try to remember what you wanted to be as an adult.
---
Games?
---
Game dev?
---
Nah. In this country there is no job for game dev.
---
Let's try software development and later try game dev.
---
We still have a life in front of us, there will be time.
---
Surely, there will be time...
name: Window2

commands_raw:
What was the last time you went outside?
---
That's right. You have been for years. 
---
But the door has been always open.
---
Why not leave?
---
Leave all of this behind.
---
Nah. This is fine.
--- 
Just need to work and buy everything I need.
No use to go outside.
name: Window3

commands_raw:
This is a nice view.
---
What else do you want? Working from home
---
You can have a quick peek outside when your eyes feel tired.
---
And it makes your spacework feel cozy.
name: Window4

commands_raw: eyes.
name: Window5
Mirror

commands_raw:
Left click to shoot.
signal(game,start)
name: game

commands_raw:
You finished the normies.
Good work.
The aberrants won this battle.
signal(game,end)
name: mission1

commands_raw:
You finished the hole faces.
They only work. That is tthe only thing they do.
The aberrants won this battle.
signal(game,end)
name: mission2

commands_raw:
You won against the aberrants.
They despised you, because you were different.
The ABERRANT won this battle.
signal(game,end)
name: mission3

commands_raw:
You ended up being alone.
signal(game,end)
name: mission4

commands_raw:
You are too diferrent for the weird people to like you.
---
signal(aberrationEnding)
name: MirrorAberration

commands_raw:
Infinity of eyes
on this world.
---
But none are watching me.
I am alone.
On this world.
---
Thanks for playing ${name} :D.
Don't lose your uniqueness.
---
signal(trueEnding)
name: eyes

commands_raw:
You went numb.
